name: Bonsai Worlds
description:
Important: I'm in the process of fixingbugs with Adobe AIR. It seems this has been preventing some players from running the game. Sorry for the inconvenience. 

A world-building zen game (or toy, maybe) by Enric Llagostera, with music by Holy Konni. Inspired by This Precious Land, by Craig Forrester.

Take your time, tweak your little world and enjoy watching what the humans do.

"Bonsai gardens are as mentally taxing as they are physically: not very. But that's the point. If you prune your plant every so often with miniature scissors to escape the mania of everyday life, letting your brain drift to a place of pure routine, then new ideas might sprout from the calm. It's boring and slow with purpose. Bonsai Worlds is an internet-savvy version of the exercise—meaning it's fast as hell."

- Gameological Society
